availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Patterson C. Bullock (Mason County, KY, drayman and postmaster)

body.p: Dover, Mason County, Kentucky, drayman and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine Bullock. Father of Ann C. Bullock, Frank Bullock, Achilles Bullock, Ellenora Bullock, Harriet Bullock. Drayman in Dover in 1850. Waterman in Dover in 1860. Appointed postmaster of Dover on June 18, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 137 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, District 3, p. 237.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, District 1, p. 19A.
